body.p: In the first Gentoo Weekly Newsletter of December we relay to you the Gentoo Documentation Project's call for translators for Polish, German, Danish, Indonesian, Portuguese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, and French, as well as point you to some praise Gentoo received in the Linux Weekly News. Read on further for a profile of developer Chris PeBenito, several GLSAs, plenty of community coverage, and a tip on using ANSI escape sequences to make colorful output. Enjoy!
